item.description:
No Kiddin'.... Let's make this one a two month long fly out! From April 1 to June 1. Let's see how many of our members can visit the 39 Airports in Massachusetts.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Print out a Sheet and check mark them and log in! the top Three Winners will receive prizes. No, it won't be free gas... It won't be an oil change or brake pads or anything else you'll need from these flights. :-) But, the prizes will be good. You could win the Big Weekend at OshKosh! Just trying to round up more prizes. Stay tuned. Donations welcomed! Prior flights don't count.

So, get in your planes and get going!

Your Captain and First Officer,

 Charley and Frankie

p.s. I'm going to upload a file to this site to downlaod and print out. Ready, set, go!

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Log 'em All Flying Contest
